products.name: PREMIUM IPTV Subscription 12 Months
products.description: PLATINIUM IPTV offers you exclusive access to more than 16,500 channels and 40,000 films and series on VOD, all in 4K, FHD, HD without any buffering. Enjoy stable streaming across all your devices, with 24/7 support and customization options. Subscribe now for a premium IPTV experience.
features: Extensive library of over 50,000 movies and series
